title: CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER, FROZEN BANANA DIPS
summary: You can never have too many hor d'oeuvre recipes, so give CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER, FROZEN BANANA DIPS a try. For 32 cents per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. Watching your figure? This gluten free, dairy free, and fodmap friendly recipe has 194 calories, 3g of protein, and 11g of fat per serving. Only a few people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. If you have bananas, chocolate chips, coconut oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is brought to you by Foodista. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 25%. This score is rather bad. Frozen Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Bites, Frozen Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Bites, and Frozen Banana-peanut Butter-chocolate Chip Milkshakes are very similar to this recipe.
